root: ^Welcome to William Worm: Escape from Bug York! Can you help William escape?

c-0: ^George W. Bug is dead. You are William Worm, stuck in the middle of Bug York. You are currently in the hospital with secret service swarming you. You must survive.
c-1: ^This is the room you started in.
hallway: ^ There is a hallway that leads out of the room and goes left or right. What do you do?

c-2: ^You piss on George W. Bug's body. That will teach your dad.
c-3: ^You come along a hallway that is going out to the right. Along the wall to your left is a door that is cracked slightly ajar. Which way do you go?
^A.Forward   B.Into the Right Hallway   C.Check Out the door   D.Go back to the starting room
c-4: ^You see a sign that says Floor 3 and arrive at an intersection of two hallways. Which way do you go?

fight: ^Two Bugs appear in front of you! Prepare to fight!
